turns.speaker: COMPUTER
turns.text: Systems register functional.

turns.speaker: GWEN
turns.text: All systems are working, Commander. ,~ -cc	PINK) -' C -

turns.speaker: FRED
turns.text: U.... What do you think?

turns.speaker: NERVOUS TECH
turns.text: That possibly... The valence bonds have shifted bi-laterally?

turns.speaker: FRED
turns.text: ... What does that mean?

turns.speaker: NERVOUS TECH
turns.text: What does that mean?!!!  Yes, I see! Yes... It means that perhaps... the... bonding molecules have become covalent?!...

turns.speaker: FRED
turns.text: Covalent... Right. So...

turns.speaker: NERVOUS TECH
turns.text: So our solution is to introduce a bonding substrate! - A two molecule compound sharing a free electron - and bombard the ions with their reflective isotopes!

turns.speaker: FRED
turns.text: OK!

turns.speaker: FRED
turns.text: Hey Commander. Listen, we found some Beryllium on a nearby planet. We might be able to get there if we re-configure the solar matrix in parallel for endothermic propulsion. What do you think?

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: I...Well, uh... Yes, absolutely.

turns.speaker: FRED
turns.text: A hologram...

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: Never mind, Fred....

turns.speaker: FRED
turns.text: No, no... I'll think on it...

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: The digital conveyer?  You mean I'm going to get diced into cubes and sorted up there in a thousand pieces?

turns.speaker: FRED
turns.text: Right.

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: I'll take my chances with Gorignak.

turns.speaker: FRED
turns.text: No, I'll kill you. .

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: Listen Fred. You did this for four years on the show. You can do it now... Put your hands on the controls..

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: Fred, I worked summer stock with Hopkins. Regional theater with Hoffman. But I swear to God I have never met an actor who could hit his mark, or nail his lines with the professional consistency of a Freddy Kwan. You're Mr. Dependable... You can do this.

turns.speaker: FRED
turns.text: You worked with Hopkins? I worship Hopkins.

turns.speaker: FRED
turns.text: As good as Hopkins?

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: Hopkins can't drink your bathwater Fred.

turns.speaker: GUY
turns.text: How do you remember this stuff?

turns.speaker: FRED
turns.text: Oh I make it up. Use lots of "k"s and "v"s.

turns.speaker: FRED
turns.text: You Okay, Alex?

turns.speaker: GUY
turns.text: I don't like this... I don't like this at all...

turns.speaker: FRED
turns.text: ...The digital conveyor.

turns.speaker: GUY
turns.text: Of course... We'll just zap him up with the digital conveyor!

turns.speaker: FRED
turns.text: We've got to get that valve turned off. Their oxygen Is almost gone...

turns.speaker: GUY
turns.text: Listen, I'll go in, create a distraction. have this...  may be able to hold them back long enough for the aliens to escape.

turns.speaker: FRED
turns.text: It's suicide.

turns.speaker: GUY
turns.text: I'm just a glorified extra, Fred.  I'm a dead man anyway. If I'm going to die, I'd rather go out a hero than a coward.

turns.speaker: FRED
turns.text: Maybe you're the plucky comic relief, you ever think of that?

turns.speaker: GUY
turns.text: Listen, I was wondering, would you guys mind if I sit in today? See if anybody's interested in an autograph? Never know.

turns.speaker: GWEN
turns.text: Sure, Guy, If you can stand the excitement.

turns.speaker: GUY
turns.text: "Crewman #6"... Call me Guy.

turns.speaker: GWEN
turns.text: You... know us?

turns.speaker: GWEN
turns.text: THAT'S why you built this ship?

turns.speaker: GUY
turns.text: It's ... incredible.

turns.speaker: GUY
turns.text: The Omega 13... Why does that sound so familiar?...

turns.speaker: GWEN
turns.text: The lost footage. At the convention. The mysterious device in our last episo--historical document.

turns.speaker: GWEN
turns.text: Guy, you HAVE a last name. We just don't KNOW it.

turns.speaker: GUY
turns.text: Do I? DO I?  For all you know I'm just "CREWMAN #6"!  Okay, it's FLEEGMAN! Guy FLEEGMAN! There! Now I'm a whole person! I can't die! FLEEGMAN! THEY CAN'T KILL ME NOW, CAN THEY? CAN THEY?

turns.speaker: GWEN
turns.text: Where are the miners?

turns.speaker: GUY
turns.text: Something BAD happened here.

turns.speaker: GWEN
turns.text: Oh, they're so cute.

turns.speaker: GUY
turns.text: Of course they're cute NOW. But in a second they're going to turn MEAN and UGLY somehow and then there are going to be a million MORE of them!...

turns.speaker: GUY
turns.text: I am SO SICK of being right.

turns.speaker: GWEN
turns.text: Let's get out of here before one of those things kills guy.

turns.speaker: GWEN
turns.text: How the hell is Fred supposed to project a hologram?

turns.speaker: GUY
turns.text: We're doing episode 31, Jason?

turns.speaker: GUY
turns.text: ...Okay

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: All right. Put me back on with him.

turns.speaker: GUY
turns.text: They're still behind us...

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: We should have a turbo. I'm always saying "activate turbo boosters", right?...

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: Guy, you're not going to get killed on the planet, okay?

turns.speaker: GUY
turns.text: Oh, I'm not? I'm not? Then what's my last name?

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: Your last name.

turns.speaker: GUY
turns.text: Yeah, what is it?

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: It's... I don't know.

turns.speaker: GUY
turns.text: No. Nobody does. Do you know WHY? Because my character Isn't IMPORTANT enough for a last name. Because I'm going to DIE five minutes in, why bother to come up with a last name for me?

turns.speaker: GUY
turns.text: We're screwed... We're so screwed...

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: All right, let's all settle down.  If we're going to get through this we're going to have to exercise self control.

turns.speaker: GUY
turns.text: That's it, that's what's going to kill me.

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: Let's just pick up the pace a little, shall we?

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: It doesn't have to be a hologram... Just a diversion.

turns.speaker: GUY
turns.text: Jason, are we doing Episode 31 or not?

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: It's a rough plan, Guy! What does it matter if we're doing episode 31 or not?!

turns.speaker: GUY
turns.text: BECAUSE I DIED IN EPISODE 31!

turns.speaker: GUY
turns.text: I know...  You contruct a weapon.  Look around, can you form some sort of rudimentary lathe?...

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: A LATHE??? Get off the line, Guy.'

turns.speaker: GUY
turns.text: We~re oetting hammered, Jason.  Return fIre?

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: No. Keep all energy to the armor.

turns.speaker: GUY
turns.text: Hi everybody.

turns.speaker: TOMMY
turns.text: Hey. Thanks for one nice intro... uh.

turns.speaker: GUY
turns.text: Guy... You probably don't remember me do you?   I was on the show in '82.  Episode 31?  Got killed by the lava monster before the first commercial?  "Crewman #6?"

turns.speaker: GUY
turns.text: More to the left... Stay parallel...

turns.speaker: TOMMY
turns.text: Hey, YOU want to drive?

turns.speaker: TOMMY
turns.text: "Assault on Voltareck III."  Episode... 31 I think.

turns.speaker: GUY
turns.text: We're doing episode 31?

turns.speaker: TOMMY
turns.text: Whatever, the one with the hologram. The wall of fire.

turns.speaker: TOMMY
turns.text: They're gone.

turns.speaker: GUY
turns.text: Where'd they go? Back inside?

turns.speaker: TOMMY
turns.text: You have no idea what a perimeter is, do you?

turns.speaker: GUY
turns.text: Not a clue. You?

turns.speaker: TOMMY
turns.text: I think he just likes pointing at things.

turns.speaker: GUY
turns.text: We're alive!

turns.speaker: TOMMY
turns.text: We made It. Commander, we made it.' m ALEXANDER sort ov) By Grabtnar' s h~mmer, we  ove to te   ono 'tale.

turns.speaker: GUY
turns.text: ~e're alive!

turns.speaker: TOMMY
turns.text: We made it. Commander, we made it.'

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: A few fans built a little set in their garage.  .  I come in for an hour at most. It's a nothing.

turns.speaker: GWEN
turns.text: How much of a nothing? Not enough to split five ways kind of a nothing?

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: What do you want me to say, Gwen?... They wanted the Commander.

turns.speaker: GWEN
turns.text: What?

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: You smiled at me.

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: This isn't mine. Wait, where is that kid?...

turns.speaker: GWEN
turns.text: You know it's one thing to treat us this way, but how can you do this to your fans?...

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: It's Jason...

turns.speaker: GWEN
turns.text: One minute   I'm -  Hey, I'm dressing.'

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: Oh come on, it's not like I haven't-

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: Let me try.  Computer?  Computer?...

turns.speaker: GWEN
turns.text: Only answers to me.

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: But I'm the Commander!

turns.speaker: GWEN
turns.text: On the show I talk to the computer and repeat what it says. So that's what they built.

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: C'mon, we're wanted up on the command deck.

turns.speaker: GWEN
turns.text: Wait. When are you going to tell them?

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: Tell them? About...

turns.speaker: GWEN
turns.text: Who we are. Don't you think they're going to be PISSED?

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: Are you kidding? I'm not going to tell them.

turns.speaker: GWEN
turns.text: Well you have to tell them.  What if something happens? We're actors, not astronauts... We can't do this stuff!

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: It's not the STUFF. I mean, anybody can learn the STUFF...  The important thing is COMMITMNT. 99% of anything is just committing to it.

turns.speaker: GWEN
turns.text: Ninty-nine percent of ACTING is commitment. ACTING.  Stella Adler never manned a resonance cannon, she taught ACTING...

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: Hey... Hey where are you going?

turns.speaker: GWEN
turns.text: We have no right to do this. They deserve to know.

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: Gwen... Gwen, c'mon, wait, no!

turns.speaker: GWEN
turns.text: We're leaving, Jason. We're leaving NOW.

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: Let me think. I need time to think.

turns.speaker: GWEN
turns.text: There's nobody here. Jason...

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: Mathesar, maybe we should get some of your crew up here.

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: All right, now nobody panic, I've dealt with this guy before and believe me, he's as stupid as he is ugly.

turns.speaker: GWEN
turns.text: Jason..

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: We're going to fire everything we've got at him, all right?

turns.speaker: GWEN
turns.text: JASON...

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: You just keep pushing those buttons, those there, send everything at him, okay?

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: I made the CUT THE LINE gesture. You nodded okay.'

turns.speaker: GWEN
turns.text: I thought It was the "We're dead" gesture! I was agreeing! Like I know where the hold button is???

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: Listen, Sarris, you can't blame me for trying...

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: Maybe we can lose them in that cloud.

turns.speaker: GWEN
turns.text: I don't think that's a cloud...

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: Are they behind us?

turns.speaker: GWEN
turns.text: No, I don't think so... Wait. They're not but...  Something is.  Oh my god.

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: Can it be repaired?

turns.speaker: GWEN
turns.text: Computer, can it be repaired?

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: Do we have a replacement Beryllium sphere onboard?

turns.speaker: GWEN
turns.text: Computer, do we have a replacement Beryllium sphere onboard?

turns.speaker: GWEN
turns.text: Self control?  That's funny coming from the guy that slept with every Moon Princess and Terrakian slave girl on the show!...

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: Did it ever occur to you that if you had been a little more supportive you could have held on to me?

turns.speaker: GWEN
turns.text: I could have held on to YOU! ...

turns.speaker: GWEN
turns.text: You're playing your good side.

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: Don't be ridiculous.

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: All right... here's the plan:  First, Fred, we need a diversion to clear those things out of the compound, then Gwen, Alex, Fred and I go down to get the sphere.  Any of those things come back, give a signal. Guy, you set up a perimeter.

turns.speaker: GWEN
turns.text: Why does this sound so familiar?

turns.speaker: GWEN
turns.text: How does the rolling help, actually?

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: It helps.

turns.speaker: GWEN
turns.text: Clenched jaw...

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: Will you stop RIDING ME?!

turns.speaker: GWEN
turns.text: Jason.. Can you hear me?

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: Yes. Yes, I'm here!

turns.speaker: GWEN
turns.text: Thank God. Are you okay?

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: Yeah. But I've got Gorignak staring me in the face. I think I can take it though...

turns.speaker: GWEN
turns.text: Jason, we're going to use the digital conveyer to get you out of there.

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: What?  What did he say?

turns.speaker: GWEN
turns.text: Nothing. Hold please.

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: Wait, the pig lizard is gone. Why are they still chanting for the pig lizard?

turns.speaker: GWEN
turns.text: Turn on the translation circuit.

turns.speaker: GWEN
turns.text: Jason?...  I don't think the pig lizard was Gorignak...

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: What the hell are you talking about?

turns.speaker: GWEN
turns.text: So... We get to shut down the neutron reactor?

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: Right.

turns.speaker: GWEN
turns.text: Uh... I hate to break it to you Jason, but I don't know how to shut down a neutron reactor, and unless you took a Learning Annex course I don't know about, I'm pretty sure you don't know how to shut down a neutron reactor either.

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: No I don't. But I know somebody who does.

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: There's no hatch.  There's no hatch!

turns.speaker: GWEN
turns.text: Wait... Jason, Here!...

turns.speaker: GWEN
turns.text: What IS that thing? It serves no useful purpose to have a bunch of CHOPPY CRUSHY things in the middle of a CATWALK!?.'

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: Gwen...

turns.speaker: GWEN
turns.text: We shouldn't have to DO this!  It makes NO LOGICAL SENSE! Why is it HERE?

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: Because it was on the show!

turns.speaker: GWEN
turns.text: Well forget it!  I'm not going.  This episode was badly written!

turns.speaker: GWEN
turns.text: He's accelerating to Mark 6.

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: Mark 12.

turns.speaker: GWEN
turns.text: never doubted you for a second.

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: TOMMY, 270 DEGREE TURN TO PORT!

turns.speaker: TOMMY
turns.text: Where the hell is he?  An hour and a half late.  An hour and a half!

turns.speaker: GWEN
turns.text: This is great!  They're going to start eating each other out there.

turns.speaker: GWEN
turns.text: You're kidding. When for?

turns.speaker: TOMMY
turns.text: Tomorrow morning, before the store opening.

turns.speaker: GWEN
turns.text: Unbelievable.

turns.speaker: TOMMY
turns.text: You are so full of shit

turns.speaker: GWEN
turns.text: You gotta admit, they do love him.

turns.speaker: TOMMY
turns.text: Almost as much as he loves himself.

turns.speaker: TOMMY
turns.text: That's it, It's go time.

turns.speaker: GWEN
turns.text: Don't do it, Tommy. He's not worth it.

turns.speaker: TOMMY
turns.text: You should have let me hit him.

turns.speaker: GWEN
turns.text: I don't know guys... I mean, he almost looked... sincere. I know, it's bizarre!

turns.speaker: TOMMY
turns.text: You know, that's really getting annoying.

turns.speaker: GWEN
turns.text: I have ONE job on this lousy ship. It's stupid, but I'm going to DO it. GOT IT?

turns.speaker: TOMMY
turns.text: Sure, no problem.

turns.speaker: GWEN
turns.text: Oh my god! Tommy! Stop the pod! Stop the pod!

turns.speaker: TOMMY
turns.text: I can't...  It's on autopilot!...

turns.speaker: GWEN
turns.text: We got the Sphere but the Commander's down there with a bunch of cannibals!  Teb, reset the pod, we're going back.

turns.speaker: TOMMY
turns.text: That thing's not going to get us down there fast enough.  Face it, he's dead.

turns.speaker: GWEN
turns.text: Wait, Fred, what about your thing, you know... "Digitize me, Sergeant Chen!"

turns.speaker: TOMMY
turns.text: I heard it too.

turns.speaker: GWEN
turns.text: Is this really the most important thing we could be talking about right now?

turns.speaker: TOMMY
turns.text: JASON  You think you could-get any closer to those mines?

turns.speaker: TOMMY
turns.text: Closer?  I can try.

turns.speaker: GWEN
turns.text: What are you doing? What are thev doino? ~7C INT. SARRIS' SHIP	h37C

turns.speaker: GWEN
turns.text: Tommy, look!  Those lights...

turns.speaker: TOMMY
turns.text: I see them!  I see them! RD STREET	PASADENA 57

turns.speaker: SARRIS
turns.text: First, I require the Omega 13... Second-

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: Okey dokey, let's fire blue particle cannons full. Fire red particle cannons full. Fire gannet magnets left and right. Fire pulse catapults from all chutes. And throw this thing at him too, killer.

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: Yes... Hi Sarris... How are you doing?

turns.speaker: SARRIS
turns.text: Better than my Lieutenant.  He failed to activate ship's neutron armor as quickly as I'd hoped on our last encounter.

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: Right.  Well... Listen, I'm  I'm sorry about that whole... thing.. before. It was kind of a misunderstanding.  I'm sure we can work this out like reasonable people... How's the uh...  ... that going to heal up? God, I hope so, I feel just awful about that.

turns.speaker: SARRIS
turns.text: Deliver the device now or I will destroy your ship.

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: Listen, I'd like to, but frankly.. I'm not even sure where it is, or even...

turns.speaker: SARRIS
turns.text: You have ten seconds.

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: All right. You got it. You win. I'll deliver it now.  Just give me a moment to set it up.

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: SARRIS
turns.text: Then tell me one thing... What does it do, the device? The Omega 13.

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: I don't know.

turns.speaker: SARRIS
turns.text: Is it a bomb?  A booby trap?  Tell me!

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: Stop, please! I don't know!

turns.speaker: SARRIS
turns.text: Prepare a tear harness for the female...

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: No! I swear I don't know! Please!

turns.speaker: SARRIS
turns.text: Do you think I'm a fool? That the Commander does not know every bolt, every weld of his ship?

turns.speaker: SARRIS
turns.text: Wait. What did you say?

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: Please, don't hurt them, it's not their fault. I'm not the Commander, I don't know anything.

turns.speaker: SARRIS
turns.text: Explain -

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: Gwen. The show. There's no choice. Do it.

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: My name is Jason Nesmith. I'm an actor. We're all actors.

turns.speaker: SARRIS
turns.text: Our dimwitted friends don't understand the concept of acting. They have no theater, no imagination these scientists.

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: We pretend...

turns.speaker: SARRIS
turns.text: Simpler.

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: We.. We lie.

turns.speaker: SARRIS
turns.text: Yes... You understand THAT, don't you, Mathesar?...

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: Accelerate to Mark 4, Tommy.

turns.speaker: SARRIS
turns.text: This is embarrassing, really.   I shan't tell this story when I return home.

turns.speaker: MATHESAR
turns.text: Commander, I must speak to you. It is a matter of supreme importance... We are Thermians from the Klatu Nebula, and we require your help. I beseech you to come with us, back to our ship. A great many lives hang in the balance...

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: Right, If this is about the thing tomorrow you can hammer out the details with my agent, but make sure I have a limo from my house, they jammed me into a Toyota the last time I did one of these

turns.speaker: MATHESAR
turns.text: I... certainly, but-

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: Catch me later, okay?

turns.speaker: MATHESAR
turns.text: Sir, I understand this is a terrible breach of protocol, but please, I beg you to hear our plea. We are Thermians from the Klatu Nebula.  Our people are being systematically hunted and slaughtered by Roth'h'ar Sarris of Fatu-Krey. Sarris wants the Omega 13. We are to meet in negotiation. However our past efforts in this regard have been nothing short of disastrous. The flames, the death...  Please Captain, you are our last hope.  We have secured a limousine.

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: Oh, right! The thing with the thing. Come on in, I'll get some pants on.

turns.speaker: MATHESAR
turns.text: Commander... Welcome to the Protector II.  Would you like to don your uniform?

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: Mind If we skip that?  I have to get back pretty quick for this thing in Van Nuys.

turns.speaker: MATHESAR
turns.text: As you wish.

turns.speaker: MATHESAR
turns.text: Commander?... Where are you... going?

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: Home.

turns.speaker: MATHESAR
turns.text: You... You mean Earth?

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: Yeah. "Earth." Time to get back to "Earth," kids.

turns.speaker: MATHESAR
turns.text: But Commander... The negotiation... You... You... You fired on him.

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: Right. Long live... What's your planet?

turns.speaker: MATHESAR
turns.text: Theramin.

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: Long live Theramini.  Take a left here?

turns.speaker: MATHESAR
turns.text: But what if Sarris survives?

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: Oh, I don't think so. I gave him both barrels.

turns.speaker: MATHESAR
turns.text: He has a very powerful ship. Perhaps you would like to wait to see the results of-

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: I would but I am REALLY running late and the 134's a parking lot after 2:00.  But listen, the guy gives you any more trouble, just give a call...

turns.speaker: MATHESAR
turns.text: An interstellar vox.

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: Thanks

turns.speaker: MATHESAR
turns.text: How can we thank you, Commander. You- You have saved our people.

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: It was a lot of fun. You kids are great.

turns.speaker: MATHESAR
turns.text: Weapons storage...

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: It's perfectly safe. I promise.

turns.speaker: MATHESAR
turns.text: ... Maintenance facility...

turns.speaker: MATHESAR
turns.text: To our brave guests.  Few in this universe have the opportunity to meet their heroes.  We are blessed to count ourselves among them.

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: Wherever a distress signal sounds among the stars, we'll be there, this fine ship, this fine crew. Never give up, never surrender!

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: Mathesar?. .. Has Sarris seen the.. historical records?

turns.speaker: MATHESAR
turns.text: NO, Thank God he has not.

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: Then how did he find out about the device?

turns.speaker: MATHESAR
turns.text: Our former Commander was not... Strong.

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: Former Commander?

turns.speaker: MATHESAR
turns.text: I'm sorry. You deserve to be shown.

turns.speaker: MATHESAR
turns.text: Commander...

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: Mathesar, I need you to prepare pods for my crew.

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: Mathesar? What is that?

turns.speaker: MATHESAR
turns.text: It's the Tothian mine field left standing from the Great War of 12185.

turns.speaker: MATHESAR
turns.text: A thousand apologies. We have failed you.

turns.speaker: JASON
turns.text: You what?.. What are you talking about?

turns.speaker: MATHESAR
turns.text: We have seen you victorious in many more desperate situations. The fault must lie with us, with the ship...
